result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy P. Bandoli

records.addlTxt:
No abusive contact w/ P.R.B
Absolute sobriety.
Not to consume/possess any controlled substances unless prescribed.

8:42 AM Defendant Timothy P. Bandoli in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Agreement reached. Court questions the defendant re: his right to proceed without counsel. Defendant waives his right to an attorney. State speaks re: agreement reached. Defendant agrees. Court questions the defendant re: his plea questionnaire and waiver of rights form. Court finds the defendant freely and knowingly waives his rights. Court finds there is a factual basis.


22CM21-Dismissed

State makes argument re: sentencing/deferred agreement. Defendant makes statement.

22CM24-Def. pleas guilty. Court accepts plea and accepts the deferred agreement.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 21, 2022 at 08:45 am.

11:42 AM Defendant Timothy P. Bandoli in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Agreement reached. Set for plea hearing. Bond to continue.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 08:45 am.

1:16 PM Defendant Timothy P. Bandoli in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Court reviews file. Defendant did not appear on 6/13/22. Defendant speaks re: non-appearance. Court reviews bond conditions and waiver of right to an attorney. Status from the State-defendant has all paperwork and will review. Court will not issue warrant-signature bond stays in place. Set for status.
Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status conference on June 29, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Voluntary appearance on June 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

9:35 AM Defendant Timothy P. Bandoli not in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. No appearance by defendant. Status from the State. State has spoken to him-close to a resolution. Court will authorize a bench warrant-stayed until 6/17 @ 4pm.
Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:36 AM . Defendant Timothy P. Bandoli in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Court speaks to defendant re: his right to counsel. Court reviews complaint. Waived reading. Not guilty plea is entered. Bond to continue and to apply to both cases.
Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 09:30 am.
